description.en: Unlimited time, unlimited tries. Just sit back and relax!
description.de: Unbegrenzte Zeit, unbegrenzte Versuche. Lehn dich zurück und schnapp' sie dir alle!
description.fr: Unlimited time, unlimited tries. Just sit back and relax!

description.en: Only the original 151, one shot for every Pokémon. Can you do it?
description.de: Nur die originalen 151. Ein Versuch pro Pokémon. Schaffst du es?
description.fr: Only the original 151, one shot for every Pokémon. Can you do it?

description.en: One shot for Pokémon from every gen.
description.de: Ein Versuch pro Pokémon aus allen Generationen.
description.fr: One shot for Pokémon from every gen.

description.en: Infinite guesses, but that's all you get. No image, no hints.
description.de: Endlose Versuche, aber das war's auch. Keine Hinweise, kein Bild.
description.fr: Infinite guesses, but that's all you get. No image, no hints.

description.en: Can you guess the Pokémon, just from its cry?
description.de: Kannst du ein Pokémon nur anhand seines Rufs erraten?
description.fr: Can you guess the Pokémon, just from its cry?
